name: AnVa Polytech Bio-TPE
description: AnVa Polytech Bio-TPE (thermoplastic elastomer) is an elastomer comprising a thermoreversible network. AnVa Polytech produce parts of bio based TPE. Bio-TPE is a material that reduces the environmental impact. It replaces traditional TPE solutions with a bio based content of 30 %. Technically, Bio-TPE performs just as well as traditional TPEs.
